thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: Guy

author: Guy
title: Guy
text:
During the past few months I have been grateful for the expert advice and helpful suggestions by your staff during a difficult renovation of our heritage Victorian building while preparing it for sale. Particular thanks go to Peter Smyth and Marek Olech and ,whose constructive advise was invaluable and always available, resulting in a well presented home..
The auction carried out by Arch Staver was top grade, quick to the important features, with a touch of humour, ending in a price well over reserve.Well done by all, I will use your services in the future and would certainly recommend your group if the situation arises.
Sincerely yours,
Guy Fanning.
